title: Mafia III DLC Unlocker-BAT
description:
Battery

bumax[BAFH]

Mafia III *DLC Unlocker* (c) 2K

Release Date: 10/12/2016 Protection: Arxan+Steam
Cracked By: BAT-TEAM # of Files: few

Note:

This unlocker will allow you to access guns & cars from
the Family Kick-Back Pack DLC

Game:

It's 1968 and after years of combat in Vietnam, Lincoln
Clay knows this truth: family isn't who you're born with
it's who you die for. Now back home in New Bordeaux
Lincoln is set on escaping a criminal past. But when his
surrogate family, the black mob, is betrayed and wiped
out by the Italian Mafia, Lincoln builds a new family on
the ashes of the old and blazes a path of military-grade
revenge through those responsible. Intense gun fights
visceral hand-to-hand combat, white knuckle driving and
street smarts will all be needed. But with the right
crew, tough decisions and some dirty hands, it's possible
to make it to the top of the city's underworld

1. Unpack release
2. Copy the files to your game installation directory
3. Enjoy! :wink:

WE DONT WANT ANYONE TO CONTACT US!
WE CONTACT YOU IF NEEDED!
WEB: NEVER - IRC: NEVER - EMAIL: NEVER

Greetings to all of our friends around scene!
